detaileddescription.para: Flags built from a bitmask of values in dpp::user_flags
Discriminator (aka tag), 4 digits usually displayed with leading zeroes.

simplesect.para: To print the discriminator with leading zeroes, use format_username(). 0 for users that have migrated to the new username format.

detaileddescription.para: Reference count of how many guilds this user is in

briefdescription.para: Unique ID of object set by Discord. This value contains a timestamp, worker ID, internal server ID, and an incrementing value. Only the timestamp is relevant to us as useful metadata.

detaileddescription.para:
Fill this record from json.
j
The json to fill this record from
Reference to self

briefdescription.para: Convert to JSON.

simplesect.para: json JSON output

briefdescription.para: Construct a new user object.
Destroy the user object.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t size=0, const image_type format=i_png, bool prefer_animated=true) const
memberdef.name: get_avatar_url

briefdescription.para: Get the avatar url of the user.

simplesect.para: If the user doesn't have an avatar, the default user avatar url is returned which is always in png format!

parameterdescription.para: The size of the avatar in pixels. It can be any power of two between 16 and 4096, otherwise the default sized avatar is returned.

The format to use for the avatar. It can be one of i_webp, i_jpg, i_png or i_gif. When passing i_gif, it returns an empty string for non-animated images. Consider using the prefer_animated parameter instead.
Whether you prefer gif format. If true, it'll return gif format whenever the image is available as animated.

simplesect.para: std::string avatar url or an empty string, if required attributes are missing or an invalid format was passed

briefdescription.para: Get the default avatar url of the user. This is calculated by the discriminator.

simplesect.para: std::string avatar url or an empty string, if the discriminator is empty

briefdescription.para: Get the avatar decoration url of the user if they have one, otherwise returns an empty string.

parameterdescription.para: The size of the avatar decoration in pixels. It can be any power of two between 16 and 4096, otherwise the default sized avatar decoration is returned.

simplesect.para: std::string avatar url or an empty string

briefdescription.para: Return a ping/mention for the user.

simplesect.para: std::string mention

briefdescription.para: Get the creation time of this object according to Discord.

simplesect.para: double creation time inferred from the snowflake ID. The minimum possible value is the first second of 2015.
